title: Japanese Art: A beginning guide to drawing Japanese Comic Art
description:
http://ititli.com/images/ZHiGjBJ.jpg

As you start cycling through the pages of this book, you will see that this book:

   Will tell you what Japanese art is.
   Will list the tools you will need to draw Japanese art.
   Will show you how to shade and add shadows to your art.
   Will show you how to layout your art work and how to flesh it out.
   Will provide step-by-step instructions on how to draw.
   Will provide you with advice on how to expand your new hobby.

Japanese Art or Japanese comic art is different from Anime art. It has subtle nuances and a realistic feel to it, which its counterpart is lacking. We will compare the two and show you how to make art pieces all your own.

Japanese Art: A beginning guide to drawing Japanese Comic Art by Jiro Nishino
English | 15 Sep 2016 | ASIN: B01LWK3WLX | 74 Pages | PDF/EPUB/MOBI/AZW3 | 1.7 MB/1.7 MB/1.8 MB/1.8 MB
